name: Avoid Script Functions with High Fan-Out (PHP)
description: This rules searches for all the Script Functions with a High Fan-Out.
output:
This report lists all Script Functions with a High Fan-Out.

This QR provides the following information:
Script Function full name.
rationale: The higher the number of referenced Artifacts, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution is. The updates in referenced Artifacts will need to be tested and taken into account.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of Script Functions with a High Fan-Out.
